questions.questionText: What is the main challenge addressed by IOTAâ€™s protocol upgrade process?

answerOptions.answerText: Ensuring all validators upgrade their software simultaneously.
Allowing users to stake more tokens.

questions.questionText: How is access to a new feature controlled during a protocol upgrade?
When does a new protocol version take effect?

answerOptions.answerText: At the beginning of the next epoch.
After a validator upgrade vote is held.

questions.questionText: How do full nodes handle protocol upgrades?

answerOptions.answerText: They follow the validators' recorded actions.
